resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106819</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106819</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206850</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Continental Congress and Constitutional Convention Broadsides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kontinentaler Kongreß und konstitutionelle 
Versammlung Broadsides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le congrès continental et convention 
constitutionnelle Par le travers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Congress continental e convenção constitutional 
Broadsides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Congresso continentale e Attacchi 
costituzionali di convenzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηπειρωτικό συνέδριο και συνταγματικά broadsides 
Συνθηκών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Congreso continental y Costados 
constitucionales de la convención</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">provides 274 documents related to Congress (1774 to 1788) and the drafting and ratification of the Constitution. Items include the journals of Congress, resolutions, proclamations, committee reports, treaties, and early printed versions of the Constitution and the Declaration of Independence. Among the topics: the armed forces, foreign relations, Indians, land settlement, laws, money, and pirates.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt 274 Dokumente zur Verfügung, die auf 
Kongreß (1774 bis 1788) in Verbindung gestanden werden und das 
Zeichnen und die Bestätigung der Beschaffenheit. Einzelteile 
enthalten die Journale des Kongresses, der Zerlegungen, der 
Proklamationen, der Ausschußreports, der Verträge und der frühen 
gedruckten Versionen der Beschaffenheit und der 
Unabhängigkeitserklärung. Unter den Themen: die 
bewaffneten Kräfte, die fremden Relationen, die Inder, die 
Landregelung, die Gesetze, das Geld und die Piraten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fournit 274 documents liés au congrès (1774 à 
1788) et le dessin et la ratification de la constitution. Les 
éléments incluent les journaux du congrès, des résolutions, des 
proclamations, des états de comité, des traités, et des versions 
imprimées tôt de la constitution et de la déclaration de 
l'indépendance. Parmi les sujets : les forces armées, 
les relations étrangères, les Indiens, le règlement de terre, les 
lois, l'argent, et les pirates.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fornece 274 originais relacionados ao congress 
(1774 a 1788) e esboçar e o ratification do constitution. Os 
artigos incluem os jornais do congress, das definições, dos 
proclamations, dos relatórios do comitê, dos tratados, e de versões
impressas adiantadas do constitution e da declaração de 
independência. Entre os tópicos: as forças armadas, as 
relações extrangeiras, os indians, o estabelecimento de terra, as 
leis, o dinheiro, e os piratas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fornisce 274 documenti relativi al congresso (1774
- 1788) e la progettazione e la ratifica della costituzione. Gli
articoli includono le pubblicazioni del congresso, delle risoluzioni, 
delle proclamazioni, dei rapporti del comitato, dei trattati e delle 
versioni stampate iniziali della costituzione e della dichiarazione di
indipendenza. Fra i soggetti: le forze munite, i rapporti 
stranieri, gli indiani, l'agglomerato rurale, le leggi, i soldi ed i 
pirati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρέχει 274 έγγραφα σχετικά με το συνέδριο (1774
έως 1788) και η σύνταξη και η επικύρωση του συντάγματος. 
Τα αντικείμενα περιλαμβάνουν τα περιοδικά του συνεδρίου, των
ψηφισμάτων, των προκηρύξεων, των εκθέσεων επιτροπών, των 
συνθηκών, και των πρόωρων τυπωμένων εκδόσεων του συντάγματος και 
της Διακήρυξης της ανεξαρτησίας. Μεταξύ των θεμάτων: 
οι οπλισμένες δυνάμεις, οι ξένες σχέσεις, οι Ινδοί, η 
τακτοποίηση εδάφους, οι νόμοι, τα χρήματα, και οι πειρατές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">proporciona a 274 documentos relacionados con el 
congreso (1774 a 1788) y el bosquejo y la ratificación de la 
constitución. Los items incluyen los diarios del congreso, de 
resoluciones, de proclamaciones, de informes del comité, de tratados,
y de versiones impresas tempranas de la constitución y del 
declaración de la independencia. Entre los asuntos: las 
fuerzas armadas, las relaciones no nativas, los indios, el 
establecimiento de pista, los leyes, el dinero, y los piratas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206850</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106819</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/continental-congress-and-constitutional-convention-broadsides</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
